title: Does Yoricks wall count as a knock up?
body: When dropping his wall just right im noticing that its pushing or shoving people either to be in or out of the wall. does this count as a knock up or displacement? will it stop channels or even work with a yas ult?

replies.body: It should, anivia wall does both of those things, so does trundle pillar and similar abilities.
but trundles is designed to do an actual knock up yoricks isnt
